page.description: When resolving write conflict errors this is the text for the menu item that allows you to select your value. You can use the {myvalue} placeholder in the text. You can use language and text dictionary tags in the text.

section.title: Where this message appears
section.description: To view the mine message first tap on the write conflict
The write conflict can be resolved one of two ways, either you honor the edit that was made or you push your edit to the server and overwrite the existing one.
